item.title: Headless Hackthebox
item.description: User flag Recon Port scanning: Directory scanning: Server open a port (5000) for running a website. After scanning directories, I found 2 interesting directories : /support which we can access by For questions button. It has a form to submit a message. By checking its request, I find that it is using POST method to send data to the server. I try to send a message with a payload <h1>alert(1)</h1> and it responses a alert form which includes header of this request.
